name: 渔海
description:
Game Description


The story takes place in a remote and closed isolated village - fishing sea village, the land of this village is not suitable for growing crops. The villagers can only rely on the sea fishing for a living, but the fishing spots around the fishing village suddenly dried up, every fishing can not fish, the villagers died countless. Unfortunately, the old village headman also died, fish sea inherited the mantle of the old village headman, became the new village headman. Young he was full of enthusiasm, despite the villagers discouragement, insisted on stormy weather out to sea, for everyone to look for new fish point ...... not only returned alive, but also brought back a snake body nine people head of the sea god statue at home to feed. Twenty-two years later, the fishing village development and growth, fish sea son of "fish Xiaoshan" from the field of learning to return, but found that his sister disappeared for no reason, the fish sea lied that married overseas, but also let him not to mention ...... in a series of wrong daily, fish Xiaoshan suspected that his sister's In a series of wrong daily life, fish Xiaoshan suspected that his sister's disappearance of another hidden reasons, so began to investigate ...... unexpectedly found a shocking secret, in the face of the plight of the heavy, what should he do?

Features


I. Non-normal timeline narrative plot:
Includes: dialog, comics, videos, option multiple endings.

Traditional mythology: the evil god of Sagittarius.
Horror Folklore: Kutong Pagoda, sacrifices and offerings to the gods; "nonsense" of the left-hand path and evil arts.
Issues: feudalism, human greed.

How to play


Specific prop use: switch subplot scenes for each use.
Decryption and Exploration: Interact and collect clues in the scene, collect clues in the plot to facilitate decryption.
Mini-games: various puzzle games interspersed in the plot, such as Huarong Road, jigsaw puzzles, and lock picking.
